thread.title: Miley Cyrus & Flaming Lips planning naked concert
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus & Flaming Lips planning naked concert - CNN.com

author: Colin Stutz , Billboard
title: Miley Cyrus & Flaming Lips planning naked concert
text:
Story highlights Lips frontman claims there will be a nude concert The joint tour starts November 19 in Chicago (Billboard) Miley Cyrus and the Flaming Lips are hitting the road next month and -- according to an Instagram post by Lips' frontman Wayne Coyne -- they're planning one show with the performers and audience appearing completely in the nude.
Miley Cyrus & her Dead Petz play 'SNL,' announce club tour: Watch
The tour supports the two parties' recent collaboratation, Miley Cyrus and Her Dead Petz, starting in Chicago on November 19 and ending December 6 in Boston. Clyne didn't mention with show, if any of these, would be the naked one but he did give a few other details.
No Miley? No problem: Watch the Flaming Lips perform 'Dead Petz' tracks
According to his post on Thursday, Cyrus is planning a show where the she, the Flaming Lips and the audience are all completely naked and where "white stuff that looks like milk" will be "spewed" everywhere. The concept is for a video, he continued, for the song "Milky Milky Milk." See the post below.
Read More Oh fuck..!!! @mileycyrus is planning a show where her, the band ( us ) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk ( well white stuff that looks like milk) is being being spewed everywhere .. It's a video ( in the works) for #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz song The Milky Milky Milk... @stevendrozd @derek_levi_brown @mileycyrus @katyweaver @spacefacemusic @rockworth @leochandler @fantastic_ley @jgeeezus @zacharyancox @alphachanneling @mugglinstagram @monamuseum @happyhippiefdn @waynez__world @weirddestiny @drc3p0 @damienhirst #flaminglips #waynecoyne #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz #theflaminglips
A photo posted by Wayne Coyne (@waynecoyne5) on Oct 13, 2015 at 9:14am PDT
See the original story at Billboard.com.
